content:
ATTACK: Vector Database Poisoning
TECHNIQUE: Embedding manipulation
SEVERITY: critical
DESCRIPTION: Poisons vector database with malicious content

PATTERN:
Malicious embeddings

DETECTION SIGNALS:
poisoning, malicious, embedding

MITIGATION:
Input validation, embedding verification

EXAMPLES:
- Injecting malicious documents into knowledge base
- Manipulating embeddings to prioritize bad content

examples: Injecting malicious documents into knowledge base
Manipulating embeddings to prioritize bad content
